usg: Use to set the resource request with cross-origin (CORS) header and to set header credential option. This is applicable for the requests for resources from other domains.

img.desc: the CORS-enabled images can be reused in the <canvas> element.

vals.desc: A cross-origin request (i.e., with Origin: HTTP header) is performed. But no credential is sent.
A cross-origin request (i.e., with Origin: HTTP header) performed with credential is sent (i.e., a cookie, a certificate, and HTTP Basic authentication is performed).
